title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the height of the label does not change immediately.
OB: The label height remains the same even after modifying the font size.
EB: The label height should adjust accordingly to match the new font size.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Add a label to the application.
2. Modify the font size of the label to '18 points'.
